_meanings:
(Declined optionally like a pronoun
in <ab>nom.</ab> and voc. <ab>pl.</ab>, and
<ab>abl.</ab> and <ab>loc.</ab> <ab>sing.</ab> when it 
denotes relative position)

{@--7@} Having as a
following letter or sound, followed
by (in <ab>comp.</ab>)

{@--10@} Exceeding, having a
surplus or remainder, left over; as
in {#paraM SataM#} ‘exceeding or more than a
hundred.’

{@--12@} (At
the end of comp) Having anything
as the highest object, absorbed or 
engrossed in, intent on, solely 

devoted to, wholly engaged or occupied
in; {#paricaryAparaH#} <ls>R. 1. 91</ls>; so {#DyAnapara#},
{#Sokapara, dEvapara, ciMtApara#} &c.

{@--1@} The highest
point or pitch, culminating point.

{@--4@} The secondary 
meaning of a word.
the hinder part of the body.

a horse found in the country of
Persia or Arabia.

dependent on another, subject,
subservient; <ls>Ms. 10. 54</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 10.">83.</ls>

living or subsisting on
another's food.

being fed with the
food of others; <ls>Y. 3. 241.</ls>

{%<ab>a.</ab>%} subsisting on the food of others;
<ls>H. 1. 139.</ls>

{1} far and near,
remote and proximate.

{3} before and beyond, 

earlier and later.

{4} higher and
lower, best and worst.

{1} attached or devoted to, 
adhering to.

{4} the highest object ({%<ab>i. e.</ab>%}
sexual intercourse).

{1} the
other part (<ab>opp.</ab> {#pUrvArDa#}); the latter
half; {#dinasya pUrvArDaparArDaBinnA CAyeva#} 
{#mEtrI KalasajjanAnAM#} <ls>Bh. 2. 60.</ls>

{1}
being on the farther side or half.

{3} most 
excellent, best, most exalted, highly 
esteemed, highest, supreme; <ls>R. 3. 27</ls>,
<ls n="R.">8. 27</ls>, <ls n="R.">10. 64</ls>; <ls n="R.">16. 39</ls>; <ls>Śi. 8. 45.</ls>

{2} the whole extent of
an idea.

{%<ab>a.</ab>%} knowing both the past 

and the future.

the afternoon, the latter part
of the day.

fostered or
brought up by another.

a plant growing on
another tree.

{1} other than 
inimical, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} friendly, kind.

doing good to
others, benevolence, beneficence,
charity; {#paropakAraH puRyAya pApAya#} 
{#parapIqanaM#}.

fostered
or brought up by another.

{2} invasion by
an enemy, one of the six {%ītis%}, <ab>q. v.</ab>

a weak
or vulnerable point of another, a 
defect in another.

the irregular posteriority
of a word in a compound; {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%}  
{#BUtapUrvaH#} where the sense is {#pUrvaM BUtaH#}; so  
{#rAjadaMtaH, agnyAhitaH#} &c.

the side or
party of an enemy.

another's
food, food given by another.

a woman who has
had a former husband.

a crow
(said to nourish the cuckoo).

the (Indian) cuckoo; (so called 
because she is nourished by another,
{%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} by a crow); <ls>Ś. 5. 22</ls>;  
<ls>Ku. 6. 2</ls>; <ls>R. 9. 43</ls>; <ls>Ś. 4. 9.</ls>

a
married woman's gallant or 
paramour; <ls>Pt. 1. 180.</ls>

the abode of the
supreme being.
